name: INFILTRATOR (itch) (ICONICWARE)
description:
cause as much chaos as you want in multiple scenarios in the low-poly, fps, playground, INFILTRATOR

this game is a work in progress, and will get more updates with more abilities and mechanics as time goes on, slow motion, melee, and plenty of more levels will be put in soon, as well as a trailer for the game it self

this is still a very early build with only the first few levels of the first section but I hope you still enjoy

please tell me any bugs you find while playing 

BUGS SO FAR: you may need to restart the entire game if you die or load a level and cant fire your weapon, and you may be prop killed by physics objects (PS: grenades take a little bit to explode)
